core

Class File

  • java.lang.Object
    • tree.SimpleTreeNode
      • core.VNode
        • core.File
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class File
extends VNode
    A representation of a file in the virtual file system. This class doesn't contain any attributes where to store binary data. However, it contains a long value containing the position of the first block of data on the virtual disk file. see VirtualFileSystem.
    Author:
    Ayoub
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      returns the position of the first block on the virtual disk file that will contain this file's data.
